subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The victory was the first tournament win for the No. 3 Lobos in 11 years, which they managed — barely — with a 62-57 victory over Montana.
snippet: The victory was the first tournament win for the No. 3 Lobos in 11 years, which they managed — barely — with a 62-57 victory over Montana.
